copy.page_title: Welcome to the Guided Care Plan
copy.lead: This quick check helps match {NAME} with the right level of support. We'll ask about safety, day-to-day help, health, and who's involved in care. It takes about two minutes, saves automatically, and you can pause anytime.
copy.helper: Answer for {NAME} — the person who needs help — and we'll guide your next steps.
copy.navi_subtitle: I'm here to guide you through each question.
copy.navi_body: Begin by listing your loved one's needs and preferences. This will guide your next steps.
copy.navi_info: Starting your senior care planning journey can feel overwhelming, but you're not alone.
